text: ve kahate hai, "yadi ham tumhaare saath is maargadarshan ka anusaran karen to apane bhoo-bhaag se uchak lie jaenge." kya khataron se surakshit haram mein hamane thikaana nahin diya, jisakee or hamaaree or se rozee ke roop mein har cheez kee paidaavaar khinchee chalee aatee hai? kintu unamen se adhikatar jaanate nahin
